choose.when: insert into tbl_product(productname, description, brand, category, subcategory, pictureurl, mainpictureurl, originalprice, saleprice) values(#{productname}, #{description}, #{brand}, #{category}, #{subcategory}, #{pictureurl}, #{mainpictureurl}, #{originalprice}, #{saleprice} )
choose.otherwise: insert into tbl_product(productname, description, brand, category, subcategory, originalprice, saleprice) values(#{productname}, #{description}, #{brand}, #{category}, #{subcategory}, #{originalprice}, #{saleprice})

mapper.select: select pictureurl from tbl_product where productid=#{productid}
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'ustyle' AND TABLE_NAME = 'tbl_product'

select count(*) from tbl_product
where ${searchOption} like '%${searchKeyword}%'
SELECT count(brand) count, brand FROM tbl_product WHERE subcategory = #{subcategory} GROUP BY brand
SELECT count(subcategory) count, subcategory FROM tbl_product WHERE category in ( SELECT category FROM tbl_product WHERE subcategory = #{subcategory} GROUP BY category ) GROUP BY subcategory
SELECT count(originalprice) count, originalprice FROM tbl_product WHERE subcategory = #{subcategory} GROUP BY originalprice
